About the Company: During the initial set-up phase, Spice Islands Apparels Ltd. was manufacturing their merchandise through sub-contracted factories and basically offered only men`s shirts and ladies tops.The company has added the manufacturing of T-shirts (both men`s and ladies) to their line of products. Having successfully managed their woven & jersey business, Spice Islands expanded their operations to incorporate a new strategy - sourcing & commissioned inspections..The company also in the business activities of Finance, Garment.
